com.hazelcast.map.impl.recordstore

Class AbstractEvictableRecordStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.map.impl.recordstore.AbstractEvictableRecordStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordStore<Record>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultRecordStore

    public abstract class AbstractEvictableRecordStore
extends Object
    Contains eviction specific functionality.

        Do expiration operations.
        Parameters:
        percentage - of max expirables according to the record store size.
        backup - true if a backup partition, otherwise false.

      • isExpirable

        public boolean isExpirable()
        Returns:
        true if record store has at least one candidate entry for expiration else return false.

        Evicts entries from this record-store.
        Parameters:

      • isInfiniteTTL

        protected boolean isInfiniteTTL(long ttl)
        Returns:
        true if the supplied ttl doesn't not represent infinity and as a result entry should be removed after some time, otherwise return false to indicate entry should live forever.

                                    long now,

        Check if record is reachable according to TTL or idle times. If not reachable return null.
        Parameters:
        record - Record
        Returns:
        null if evictable.

        Parameters:

        now - current time in millis
